name: Scuba Ocean Odyssey VR
description:
Dive into the ocean as Scuba - an underwater research submersible who is tasked to collect garbage in the deep waters - and discover mind-blowing facts about plastic pollution. 

What to expect in this VR demo:

  • Swim freely in all directions (play-tested thoroughly to reduce nausea!)
  • Relax amidst mesmerizing sea life and ambience
  • Simply have fun with all the interact-able trash!

Scuba's Ocean Odyssey VR is an immersive experience that aims to spread awareness around plastic pollution in the oceans. The game mechanics are designed to encourage cleaning plastic wastes playfully while learning about pollution in the ocean. 

Who is Scuba?

Scuba is a AI research bot who has been tasked to collect garbage in the oceans. Scuba recycles this garbage at the Hub and uses that energy to recharge.
